Class Row

java.lang.Object
  Row
All Implemented Interfaces:
Section
public class Row
extends Object
implements Section

Row represents a row of squares on a Sudoku board.

Version:
May 11, 2017
Author:
Megan Tjandrasuwita

Method Detail

findUniqueValue

public int findUniqueValue(Square[][] squares,
                           Square s)
Returns the possible value that is unique to one square in the section, if there is such a value.

Specified by:
findUniqueValue in interface Section
Parameters:
squares - the 2-D array of Squares, s the Square
Returns:
an integer between 1 to 9 that is a unique possible value; otherwise, if that value doesn't exist, returns -1

getPair

public int[] getPair(Square[][] square)
Returns a pair of possible values that at least two squares in the same section have as their only possible values.

Specified by:
getPair in interface Section
Parameters:
square - a 2-D array of Squares
Returns:
array of int of length two that contains the first pair of possible values that occur in two squares of this section; null if no such pair exists

notSquare

public boolean notSquare(int a,
                         int b,
                         Square s)
Determines whether a square has the same two values and only these two values as its possible values

Parameters:
a - one of the possible values b the other possible value in the pair s a Square whose possible values are being compared to a and b
Returns:
true if the square has the parameters a and b as its only possible values; otherwise, false

processPair

public void processPair(Square[][] square,
                        int[] pair)
Removes a pair of possible values from the squares in the same section that are not a square that only has the two possible values

Specified by:
processPair in interface Section
Parameters:
pair - an array of int of length two that contains pair of possible values square a 2-D array from which the two values are removed from all squares in the same row not having the pair as their only possible values

update

public void update(Square[][] square,
                   Square aSquare)
Updates the state of a square

Specified by:
update in interface Section
Parameters:
square - a 2-D array of Squares representing each Square on the sudoku board
aSquare - one Square on the sudoku board
